lemma contour_integral_has_field_derivative: assumes A: "open A" "convex A" "a \<in> A" "z \<in> A" assumes integrable: "\<And>z. z \<in> A \<Longrightarrow> f contour_integrable_on linepath a z" assumes holo: "f holomorphic_on A" shows "((\<lambda>z. contour_integral (linepath a z) f) has_field_derivative f z) (at z within B)"
